summary: THE CONSUMER RECEIVED RECALL NOTICE CAMPAIGN #02I002000. THE  DEALER STATED THE PARTS WERE ON ORDER.  THE CONSUMER EXPERIENCED A PROBLEM WITH THE RECALL PARTS AND WAS CONCERNED ABOUT THE SAFETY OF THE VEHICLE.  *JB  THE VEHICLE WOULDN'T STOP PROPERLY ON WET ROADS.  SCC
